channel.title: SES:OLG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Olam’s Shares Rise as Cocoa, Coffee Sales Boost Profits
item.description: Shares of Singapore-based agricultural trader Olam Group Ltd. rose by the most since April after it reported a surge in first-half profit.
